text:
It will use the email as the unique id to deduplicate against known companies and associate the contact record with if it exists. If it doesn't exist, then a company will be created.
Regarding deal creation and custom object record creation you will need to govern than with a workflow on the back of the form submission

Hi <@U04HWATMT7A> I wanted to follow up on this thread to see if you would be interested in talking more about your use case via a zoom meeting with me? Alternately, you can send it to me via DM if that works better for you :slightly_smiling_face:
You can add form properties for different objects, and this will create the object if it doesn't exist indeed. If that answers your question.
